title: Restore and display all Version 12 content across tabs

requirements.summary: Ensure frontend properly fetches and displays all content from Version 12 across all tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Mission tab displays mission content with title, description, and all images
Latest Progress tab shows all articles with thumbnails and titles
X Posts tab displays all uploaded screenshots with descriptions
Ecosystem Spotlight tab shows all spotlight entries with content and images
Investing Wisdom tab displays all quotes with authors
Trusted Resources tab shows all resources with names, descriptions, and URLs
Cybercrime Awareness tab displays all articles with thumbnails
Home page displays all quick links with thumbnails
All images and thumbnails render correctly across all tabs

file_operations.description: Verify the component correctly fetches mission content using the useGetMissionContent hook and displays the title, description, and all images using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for image rendering. Ensure proper handling of the Option<MissionContent> return type from the backend and display all images in the images array.

Verify the component correctly fetches articles using the useGetAllArticles hook and displays each article's title, URL, and thumbnail image using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for the thumbnail rendering. Ensure the grid layout properly displays all articles with their associated metadata.

Verify the component correctly fetches X posts using the useGetAllXPosts hook and displays each post's image screenshot using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() along with the optional description. Ensure the gallery layout renders all uploaded screenshots properly.

Verify the component correctly fetches spotlights using the useGetAllSpotlights hook and displays each spotlight's title, content, timestamp, and optional image using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() when present. Ensure proper handling of the optional image field and link field.

Verify the component correctly fetches wisdom entries using the useGetAllWisdom hook and displays each entry's quote and author. Ensure the grid layout properly displays all wisdom entries with their associated metadata.

Verify the component correctly fetches resources using the useGetAllResources hook and displays each resource's name, description, and URL. Ensure the grid layout properly displays all resources with their associated metadata and external links.

Verify the component correctly fetches cybercrime articles using the useGetAllCybercrimeArticles hook and displays each article's title, URL, and thumbnail using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for the thumbnail rendering. Ensure the grid layout properly displays all cybercrime articles.

Verify the component correctly fetches home page links using the useGetAllHomePageLinks hook and displays each link's title, URL, and thumbnail using ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() for the thumbnail rendering. Ensure the grid layout properly displays all quick links.

requirements.summary: Fix data loading errors or empty states preventing content from displaying in all tabs
acceptanceCriteria: React Query hooks successfully fetch data from backend actor
Loading states display correctly while fetching data
Error states show meaningful messages if data fetch fails
Empty states only appear when no data exists, not due to fetch failures
All useQueries hooks properly use the authenticated actor instance

file_operations.description: Verify all query hooks (useGetMissionContent, useGetAllArticles, useGetAllXPosts, useGetAllSpotlights, useGetAllWisdom, useGetAllResources, useGetAllCybercrimeArticles, useGetAllHomePageLinks) are properly configured with the actor instance from useActor hook. Ensure enabled property is set correctly to prevent queries from running when actor is null. Add proper error handling for each query hook and verify queryKey arrays are unique and stable.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetMissionContent query. Display a loading skeleton during the isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state card when data successfully loads but missionContent is null, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllArticles query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the articles array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllXPosts query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the posts array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllSpotlights query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the spotlights array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllWisdom query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the wisdom array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllResources query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the resources array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllCybercrimeArticles query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the articles array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

Add explicit error handling for the useGetAllHomePageLinks query. Verify loading skeletons display during isLoading state. Show a meaningful error message if the query fails. Only show the empty state when data successfully loads but the links array is empty, not when there's a loading or error state.

requirements.summary: Verify all CRUD operations work correctly for all content types across all tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Add dialogs successfully create new entries for all content types
Edit dialogs successfully update existing entries with all fields
Delete buttons remove entries with confirmation dialogs
Toast notifications appear for all successful operations

file_operations.description: Verify the dialog uses useAddArticle mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure thumbnail upload using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly. Verify form validation and toast notifications display on success/error. Confirm the dialog triggers query invalidation after successful submission to refresh the articles list.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateArticle mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional thumbnail replacement using ExternalBlob works correctly with progress tracking. Verify form validation, pre-population of existing values, and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation occurs after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteArticle mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddXPost mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure image upload using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly. Verify form validation and toast notifications display on success/error. Confirm query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateXPost mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional image replacement using ExternalBlob works correctly with progress tracking. Verify form validation, pre-population of existing values, and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteXPost mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddSpotlight mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional image upload using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly. Verify form validation for required fields (title, content) and optional fields (link, image). Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateSpotlight mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional image replacement using ExternalBlob works correctly with progress tracking. Verify form validation, pre-population of existing values including optional fields, and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteSpotlight mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddWisdom mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Verify form validation for quote and author fields. Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateWisdom mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Verify form validation and pre-population of existing quote and author values. Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteWisdom mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddResource mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Verify form validation for name, description, and URL fields. Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateResource mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Verify form validation and pre-population of existing name, description, and URL values. Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteResource mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddCybercrimeArticle mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure thumbnail upload using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly. Verify form validation and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateCybercrimeArticle mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional thumbnail replacement using ExternalBlob works correctly with progress tracking. Verify form validation, pre-population of existing values, and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteCybercrimeArticle mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useAddHomePageLink mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure thumbnail upload using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly. Verify form validation and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful submission.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateHomePageLink mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure optional thumbnail replacement using ExternalBlob works correctly with progress tracking. Verify form validation, pre-population of existing values, and toast notifications. Confirm query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the delete functionality uses useDeleteHomePageLink mutation hook with proper confirmation dialog. Ensure toast notifications display on success/error and query invalidation refreshes the list after deletion.

Verify the dialog uses useUpdateMissionContent mutation hook correctly with proper error handling. Ensure multiple image uploads using ExternalBlob.fromBytes with upload progress tracking works correctly for the images array. Verify form validation for title and description fields. Confirm toast notifications and query invalidation after successful update.

Verify the edit mission functionality is properly wired to the EditMissionDialog component and that the mutation triggers query invalidation to refresh the displayed mission content after successful updates.

Verify all mutation hooks (useAddArticle, useUpdateArticle, useDeleteArticle, useAddXPost, useUpdateXPost, useDeleteXPost, useAddSpotlight, useUpdateSpotlight, useDeleteSpotlight, useAddWisdom, useUpdateWisdom, useDeleteWisdom, useAddResource, useUpdateResource, useDeleteResource, useAddCybercrimeArticle, useUpdateCybercrimeArticle, useDeleteCybercrimeArticle, useAddHomePageLink, useUpdateHomePageLink, useDeleteHomePageLink, useUpdateMissionContent) are properly configured with the actor instance and include query invalidation in the onSuccess callback to refresh the corresponding data lists after mutations complete successfully.
